bluz.prompt: A full body shot of a model wearing a loose, hip-length white satin shirt, with the camera slowly pushing in from slightly below to highlight the shirt's elegant silhouette and soft flow. The scene shifts to a close-up, where hands gently touch the fabric, showcasing its smooth texture and radiant sheen. Finally, the camera captures a waist-up view with a gentle pan left, focusing on the shirt's casual fit around the shoulders and neckline, embodying effortless style.
